amendment.description: Amendment includes in the declaration of policy the statement that it is a goal of the nation that all citizens have decent and affordable housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide policy findings for the bill which allow for a continued, more direct role for government in developing affordable housing, and to declare that "it is a goal of our Nation that all citizens have decent and affordable housing".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
